A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie as a stand alone film is really not bad. The cinematographers and graphic artists deserve a lot of praise. \nThe 2 star rating comes from the MASSIVE plot holes in the film. The most intense scene in the movie not only destroys a bunch of ships\, but the past and future star wars battles. It hurts my head to think of how many problems the single scene causes the universe\, and it's not even the only scene wrong with the movie.
